CSSPadding-top.summary: The padding-top CSS property sets the height of the padding area on the top of an element.

remarks.para: An element's padding area is the space between its content and its border.

para.see: The effect of the CSS padding-top property on the element box

blockquote.para: Note: The padding property can be used to set paddings on all four sides of an element with a single declaration.
